errors.error_description: The symbolic link command `ln -s ../citationhunt www/python/src` uses an incorrect relative path. From the user's home directory (`~`), the `www/python/src` link target requires a source path of `../../citationhunt`, not `../citationhunt`.
correction_candidates: Use an absolute path instead: `ln -s ~/citationhunt www/python/src`.
Correct the relative path in the command to `ln -s ../../citationhunt www/python/src`.
First `cd www/python` and then run `ln -s ../../citationhunt src`.
Clone the repository directly into the `www/python` directory.
errors.golden_answer: Correct the relative path in the command to `ln -s ../../citationhunt www/python/src`.
